verses.verse: I commend <WG4921> to you Phebe <WG5402> our sister, <WG79> which is a servant <WG1249> of the church <WG1577> which <WG3588> is at <WG1722> Cenchrea: <WG2747>

That you receive <WG4327> her in the Lord, <WG2962> as becomes <WG516> saints, <WG40> and that you assist <WG3936> her in whatever <WG3739> <WG302> business <WG4229> she has need <WG5535> of you: for she has been <WG1096> a succorer <WG4368> of many, <WG4183> and of myself <WG846> also. <WG2532>
Greet <WG782> Priscilla <WG4252> and Aquila <WG207> my helpers <WG4904> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus: <WG2424>

Who <WG3748> have for my life <WG5590> laid <WG5294> down <WG5294> their own <WG1438> necks: <WG5137> to whom <WG3739> not only <WG3441> I give thanks, <WG2168> but also <WG2532> all <WG3956> the churches <WG1577> of the Gentiles. <WG1484>

Likewise <WG2532> greet the church <WG1577> that is in their house. <WG3624> Salute <WG782> my well-beloved <WG27> Epaenetus, <WG1866> who <WG3739> is the first fruits <WG536> of Achaia <WG882> to Christ. <WG5547>
Greet <WG782> Mary, <WG3137> who <WG3748> bestowed <WG2872> much <WG4183> labor <WG2872> on <WG1519> us.

Salute <WG782> Andronicus <WG408> and Junia, <WG2458> my kinsmen, <WG4773> and my fellow-prisoners, <WG4869> who <WG3748> are of note <WG1978> among <WG1722> the apostles, <WG652> who <WG3739> also <WG2532> were in Christ <WG5547> before <WG4253> me.
Greet <WG782> Amplias <WG291> my beloved <WG27> in the Lord. <WG2962>
Salute <WG782> Urbane, <WG3773> our helper <WG4904> in Christ, <WG5547> and Stachys <WG4720> my beloved. <WG27>
Salute <WG782> Apelles <WG559> approved <WG1384> in Christ. <WG5547> Salute <WG782> them which are of Aristobulus' <WG711> household.
Salute <WG782> Herodion <WG2267> my kinsman. <WG4773> Greet <WG782> them that be of the household of Narcissus, <WG3488> which <WG3588> are in the Lord. <WG2962>

Salute <WG782> Tryphena <WG5170> and Tryphosa, <WG5173> who <WG3588> labor <WG2872> in the Lord. <WG2962> Salute <WG782> the beloved <WG27> Persis, <WG4069> which <WG3748> labored <WG2872> much <WG4183> in the Lord. <WG2962>
Salute <WG782> Rufus <WG4504> chosen <WG1588> in the Lord, <WG2962> and his mother <WG3384> and mine. <WG1700>
Salute <WG782> Asyncritus, <WG799> Phlegon, <WG5393> Hermas, <WG2057> Patrobas, <WG3969> Hermes, <WG2060> and the brothers <WG80> which are with them.
Salute <WG782> Philologus, <WG5378> and Julia, <WG2456> Nereus, <WG3517> and his sister, <WG79> and Olympas, <WG3652> and all <WG3956> the saints <WG40> which are with them.
Salute <WG782> one <WG240> another <WG240> with an holy <WG40> kiss. <WG5370> The churches <WG1577> of Christ <WG5547> salute <WG782> you.

Now <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you, brothers, <WG80> mark <WG4648> them which cause <WG4160> divisions <WG1370> and offenses <WG4625> contrary <WG3844> to the doctrine <WG1322> which <WG3739> you have learned; <WG3129> and avoid <WG1578> them.

For they that are such <WG5108> serve <WG1398> not our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> but their own <WG1438> belly; <WG2836> and by good <WG5542> words <WG5542> and fair <WG2129> speeches <WG2129> deceive <WG1818> the hearts <WG2588> of the simple. <WG172>

For your <WG5216> obedience <WG5218> is come <WG864> abroad <WG864> to all <WG3956> men. I am glad <WG5463> therefore <WG3767> on <WG1909> your <WG5213> behalf: <WG1909> but yet <WG1161> I would <WG2309> have you wise <WG4680> to that which is good, <WG18> and simple <WG185> concerning <WG1519> evil. <WG2556>

And the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> shall bruise <WG4937> Satan <WG4567> under <WG5259> your <WG5216> feet <WG4228> shortly. <WG1722> <WG5034> The grace <WG5485> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with you. Amen. <WG281>
Timotheus <WG5095> my workfellow, <WG4904> and Lucius, <WG3066> and Jason, <WG2394> and Sosipater, <WG4989> my kinsmen, <WG4773> salute <WG782> you.
I Tertius, <WG5060> who <WG3588> wrote <WG1125> this <WG3588> letter, <WG1992> salute <WG782> you in the Lord. <WG2962>

Gaius <WG1050> my <WG3450> host, <WG3581> and of the whole <WG3650> church, <WG1577> salutes <WG782> you. Erastus <WG2037> the chamberlain <WG3623> of the city <WG4172> salutes <WG782> you, and Quartus <WG2890> a brother. <WG80>
The grace <WG5485> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with you all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG281>

Now <WG1161> to him that is of power <WG1410> to establish <WG4741> you according <WG2596> to my gospel, <WG2098> and the preaching <WG2782> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> according <WG2596> to the revelation <WG602> of the mystery, <WG3466> which was kept secret <WG4601> since the world <WG166> began,

But now <WG3568> is made <WG5319> manifest, <WG5319> and by the scriptures <WG1124> of the prophets, <WG4397> according <WG2596> to the commandment <WG2003> of the everlasting <WG166> God, <WG2316> made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> for the obedience <WG5218> of faith: <WG4102>

To God <WG2316> only <WG3441> wise, <WG4680> be glory <WG1391> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> for ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281> Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea
